00047 //These definitions help define the start and end of the various wall indices.
00048 //This needs to be maintained if the walls change.
00049 #define WALL_LAST_WALL_OFFSET                                30
00050 #define     WALL_FIRST_AFRAME_OFFSET                         31
00051 #define WALL_LAST_AFRAME_OFFSET                              34
00052 #define     WALL_FIRST_WINDOW_OFFSET                         35
00053 #define WALL_LAST_WINDOW_OFFSET                              46
00054 #define WALL_FIRST_BROKEN_WALL_OFFSET            47
00055 #define WALL_LAST_BROKEN_WALL_OFFSET             54
00056 #define WALL_FIRST_APPENDED_WALL_OFFSET    55
00057 #define WALL_LAST_APPENDED_WALL_OFFSET     56
00058 #define WALL_FIRST_WEATHERED_WALL_OFFSET 57
00059 #define WALL_LAST_WEATHERED_WALL_OFFSET  64
00060 
00061 //I've added these definitions to add readability, and minimize conversion time for changes
00062 //incase there are new values, etc. 
00063 #define OSTRUCTS_NUMELEMENTS        ( LASTOSTRUCT - FIRSTFULLSTRUCT + 22 )
00064 #define OSTRUCTS1_NUMELEMENTS                         5
00065 #define OSTRUCTS2_NUMELEMENTS                         12
00066 #define BANKSLIST_NUMELEMENTS                         5
00067 #define ROADSLIST_NUMELEMENTS                         1
00068 #define DEBRISLIST_NUMELEMENTS                        ( LASTDEBRIS - DEBRISROCKS + 2 + 1 ) //+1 for ANOTHERDEBRIS 
00069 
00070 #define SINGLEWALL_NUMELEMENTS                        ( (LASTWALL-FIRSTWALL+1) * 2 )
00071 #define SINGLEDOOR_NUMELEMENTS                        (( LASTDOOR - FIRSTDOOR + 1 ) * 5)
00072 #define SINGLEWINDOW_NUMELEMENTS                ( LASTWALL - FIRSTWALL + 1 )
00073 #define SINGLEROOF_NUMELEMENTS                        ( (LASTROOF-FIRSTROOF+1) + (LASTSLANTROOF-FIRSTSLANTROOF+1) + \
00074                                                                                                                         (LASTWALL-FIRSTWALL+1) + (SECONDONROOF-FIRSTONROOF+1) )
00075 #define SINGLENEWROOF_NUMELEMENTS               (LASTROOF-FIRSTROOF+1) 
00076 #define SINGLEBROKENWALL_NUMELEMENTS      ( (LASTDECORATIONS-FIRSTDECORATIONS+1) + (LASTWALL-FIRSTWALL+1)*2 )
00077 #define SINGLEDECOR_NUMELEMENTS                       ( LASTISTRUCT - FIRSTISTRUCT + 1 )
00078 #define SINGLEDECAL_NUMELEMENTS                       ( LASTWALLDECAL - FIRSTWALLDECAL + EIGTHWALLDECAL - FIFTHWALLDECAL + 3 )
00079 #define SINGLEFLOOR_NUMELEMENTS                       ( LASTFLOOR - FIRSTFLOOR + 1 )
00080 #define SINGLETOILET_NUMELEMENTS                ( EIGHTISTRUCT - FIFTHISTRUCT + 1 )
00081 //#define ROOM_NUMELEMENTS                                        ( (LASTWALL-FIRSTWALL+1) + (LASTFLOOR-FIRSTFLOOR+1) + \
00082 //                                                                                                                      (LASTROOF-FIRSTROOF+1) + (LASTSLANTROOF-FIRSTSLANTROOF+1) )
00083 #define ROOM_NUMELEMENTS                                          ( (LASTWALL-FIRSTWALL+1) + (LASTFLOOR-FIRSTFLOOR+1) + \
00084                                                                                                                         (LASTROOF-FIRSTROOF+1) + (2 ))

00087 //This is a special case for trees which may have varying numbers.  There was a problem
00088 //in which we loaded a new tileset which had one less tree in it.  When we called BuildSelectionWindow(),
00089 //it would crash because it thought there was an extra tree which was now invalid.
00090 UINT16      gusNumOStructs = 0;

00111 //These are all of the different selection lists.  Changing the max_selections will
00112 //change the number of selections values you can have at a time.  This is Bret's gay code,
00113 //though I've cleaned it up a lot.
00114 Selections  SelOStructs[MAX_SELECTIONS]                     =           { {FIRSTFULLSTRUCT, 0, 1} };  // Default selections
00115 Selections  SelOStructs1[MAX_SELECTIONS]                    =           { {FOURTHOSTRUCT, 0, 1} };    // Default selections
00116 Selections  SelOStructs2[MAX_SELECTIONS]                    =           { {THIRDOSTRUCT, 0, 1} };     // Default selections
00117 Selections  SelBanks[MAX_SELECTIONS]                              =           { {FIRSTCLIFF, 0, 1} };
00118 Selections  SelRoads[MAX_SELECTIONS]                              =           { {FIRSTROAD, 0, 1} };
00119 Selections  SelDebris[MAX_SELECTIONS]                             =           { {DEBRISROCKS, 0, 1} };
00120 Selections  SelSingleWall[MAX_SELECTIONS]             =           { {FIRSTWALL, 0, 1} };
00121 Selections  SelSingleDoor[MAX_SELECTIONS]             =           { {FIRSTDOOR, 0, 1} };
00122 Selections  SelSingleWindow[MAX_SELECTIONS]           =           { {FIRSTWALL, 44, 1} };
00123 Selections  SelSingleRoof[MAX_SELECTIONS] =                       { {FIRSTROOF, 0, 1} };
00124 Selections  SelSingleNewRoof[MAX_SELECTIONS] =        { {FIRSTROOF, 0, 1} };
00125 Selections  SelSingleBrokenWall[MAX_SELECTIONS] = { {FIRSTDECORATIONS, 0, 1} };
00126 Selections  SelSingleDecor[MAX_SELECTIONS]=                       { {FIRSTISTRUCT, 0, 1} };
00127 Selections  SelSingleDecal[MAX_SELECTIONS]      =           { {FIRSTWALLDECAL, 0, 1} };
00128 Selections  SelSingleFloor[MAX_SELECTIONS] =                { {FIRSTFLOOR, 0, 1} };
00129 Selections  SelSingleToilet[MAX_SELECTIONS] =               { {FIFTHISTRUCT, 0, 1} };
00130 Selections  SelRoom[MAX_SELECTIONS]             =                             { {FIRSTWALL, 0, 1} };

00171 //    CreateJA2SelectionWindow
00172 //
00173 //    Creates a selection window of the given type.
00174 //
00175 void CreateJA2SelectionWindow( INT16 sWhat )
00176 {
00177       DisplaySpec *pDSpec;
00178       UINT16 usNSpecs;
00179 
00180       fAllDone = FALSE;
00181 
00182       DisableEditorTaskbar( );
00183       
00184       // Load up the button images
00185       iButtonIcons[ CANCEL_ICON ] = LoadGenericButtonIcon( "EDITOR//bigX.sti" );
00186       iButtonIcons[ UP_ICON ] = LoadGenericButtonIcon( "EDITOR//lgUpArrow.sti" );
00187       iButtonIcons[ DOWN_ICON ] = LoadGenericButtonIcon( "EDITOR//lgDownArrow.sti" );
00188       iButtonIcons[ OK_ICON ] = LoadGenericButtonIcon( "EDITOR//checkmark.sti" );
00189       
00190       iSelectWin = CreateHotSpot(0, 0, 600, 360, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00191                                                                                     DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, SelWinClkCallback);      
00192 
00193       iCancelWin = CreateIconButton((INT16)iButtonIcons[CANCEL_ICON], 0,
00194                                                                                     BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT, 600, 40,
00195                                                                                     40, 40, BUTTON_TOGGLE,
00196                                                                                     MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00197                                                                                     DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, CnclClkCallback);
00198       SetButtonFastHelpText(iCancelWin,L"Cancel selections");
00199 
00200       iOkWin = CreateIconButton((INT16)iButtonIcons[OK_ICON], 0,
00201                                                                                     BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT, 600, 0,
00202                                                                                     40, 40, BUTTON_TOGGLE,
00203                                                                                     MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00204                                                                                     DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, OkClkCallback);
00205       SetButtonFastHelpText(iOkWin,L"Accept selections");
00206 
00207       iScrollUp = CreateIconButton((INT16)iButtonIcons[UP_ICON], 0,
00208                                                                                     BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT, 600, 80,
00209                                                                                     40, 160, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE,
00210                                                                                     MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00211                                                                                     DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, UpClkCallback);
00212       SetButtonFastHelpText(iScrollUp,L"Scroll window up");
00213 
00214       iScrollDown = CreateIconButton((INT16)iButtonIcons[DOWN_ICON], 0,
00215                                                                                     BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT, 600, 240,
00216                                                                                     40, 160, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE,
00217                                                                                     MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00218                                                                                     DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, DwnClkCallback);
00219       SetButtonFastHelpText(iScrollDown,L"Scroll window down");
00220 
00221       fButtonsPresent = TRUE; 
00222 
00223       SelWinSpacing.iX = 2;
00224       SelWinSpacing.iY = 2;
00225 
00226       SelWinStartPoint.iX = 1;
00227       SelWinStartPoint.iY = 15;
00228 
00229       iTopWinCutOff = 15;
00230       
00231       SelWinEndPoint.iX = 599;
00232       SelWinEndPoint.iY = 359;
00233 
00234       iBotWinCutOff = 359;
00235  
00236       switch( sWhat )
00237       {
00238             case SELWIN_OSTRUCTS:
00239                   pDSpec = OStructs;
00240                   usNSpecs = gusNumOStructs;//OSTRUCTS_NUMELEMENTS;
00241                   pSelList = SelOStructs;
00242                   pNumSelList = &iNumOStructsSelected;
00243                   break;
00244 
00245             case SELWIN_OSTRUCTS1:
00246                   pDSpec = OStructs1;
00247                   usNSpecs = OSTRUCTS1_NUMELEMENTS;
00248                   pSelList = SelOStructs1;
00249                   pNumSelList = &iNumOStructs1Selected;
00250                   break;
00251 
00252             case SELWIN_OSTRUCTS2:
00253                   pDSpec = OStructs2;
00254                   usNSpecs = OSTRUCTS2_NUMELEMENTS;
00255                   pSelList = SelOStructs2;
00256                   pNumSelList = &iNumOStructs2Selected;
00257                   break;
00258 
00259             case SELWIN_BANKS:
00260                   pDSpec = BanksList;
00261                   usNSpecs = BANKSLIST_NUMELEMENTS;
00262                   pSelList = SelBanks;
00263                   pNumSelList = &iNumBanksSelected;
00264                   break;
00265 
00266             case SELWIN_ROADS:
00267                   pDSpec = RoadsList;
00268                   usNSpecs = ROADSLIST_NUMELEMENTS;
00269                   pSelList = SelRoads;
00270                   pNumSelList = &iNumRoadsSelected;
00271                   break;
00272 
00273             case SELWIN_DEBRIS:
00274                   pDSpec = DebrisList;
00275                   usNSpecs = DEBRISLIST_NUMELEMENTS;
00276                   pSelList = SelDebris;
00277                   pNumSelList = &iNumDebrisSelected;
00278                   break;
00279 
00280             case SELWIN_SINGLEWALL:
00281                   pDSpec = SingleWall;
00282                   usNSpecs = SINGLEWALL_NUMELEMENTS;
00283                   pSelList = SelSingleWall;
00284                   pNumSelList = &iNumWallsSelected;
00285                   break;
00286             case SELWIN_SINGLEDOOR:
00287                   pDSpec = SingleDoor;
00288                   usNSpecs = SINGLEDOOR_NUMELEMENTS;
00289                   pSelList = SelSingleDoor;
00290                   pNumSelList = &iNumDoorsSelected;
00291                   break;
00292             case SELWIN_SINGLEWINDOW:
00293                   pDSpec = SingleWindow;
00294                   usNSpecs = SINGLEWINDOW_NUMELEMENTS;
00295                   pSelList = SelSingleWindow;
00296                   pNumSelList = &iNumWindowsSelected;
00297                   break;
00298             case SELWIN_SINGLEROOF:
00299                   pDSpec = SingleRoof;
00300                   usNSpecs = SINGLEROOF_NUMELEMENTS;
00301                   pSelList = SelSingleRoof;
00302                   pNumSelList = &iNumRoofsSelected;
00303                   break;
00304             case SELWIN_SINGLENEWROOF:
00305                   pDSpec = SingleNewRoof;
00306                   usNSpecs = SINGLENEWROOF_NUMELEMENTS;
00307                   pSelList = SelSingleNewRoof;
00308                   pNumSelList = &iNumNewRoofsSelected;
00309                   break;
00310             case SELWIN_SINGLEBROKENWALL:
00311                   pDSpec = SingleBrokenWall;
00312                   usNSpecs = SINGLEBROKENWALL_NUMELEMENTS;
00313                   pSelList = SelSingleBrokenWall;
00314                   pNumSelList = &iNumBrokenWallsSelected;
00315                   break;
00316             case SELWIN_SINGLEDECOR:
00317                   pDSpec = SingleDecor;
00318                   usNSpecs = SINGLEDECOR_NUMELEMENTS;
00319                   pSelList = SelSingleDecor;
00320                   pNumSelList = &iNumDecorSelected;
00321                   break;
00322             case SELWIN_SINGLEDECAL:
00323                   pDSpec = SingleDecal;
00324                   usNSpecs = SINGLEDECAL_NUMELEMENTS;
00325                   pSelList = SelSingleDecal;
00326                   pNumSelList = &iNumDecalsSelected;
00327                   break;
00328             case SELWIN_SINGLEFLOOR:
00329                   pDSpec = SingleFloor;
00330                   usNSpecs = SINGLEFLOOR_NUMELEMENTS;
00331                   pSelList = SelSingleFloor;
00332                   pNumSelList = &iNumFloorsSelected;
00333                   break;
00334             case SELWIN_SINGLETOILET:
00335                   pDSpec = SingleToilet;
00336                   usNSpecs = SINGLETOILET_NUMELEMENTS;
00337                   pSelList = SelSingleToilet;
00338                   pNumSelList = &iNumToiletsSelected;
00339                   break;
00340             case SELWIN_ROOM:
00341                   pDSpec = Room;
00342                   usNSpecs = ROOM_NUMELEMENTS;
00343                   pSelList = SelRoom;
00344                   pNumSelList = &iNumRoomsSelected;
00345                   break;
00346       }
00347 
00348       BuildDisplayWindow( pDSpec, usNSpecs, &pDispList, &SelWinStartPoint, &SelWinEndPoint, 
00349                                                             &SelWinSpacing, CLEAR_BACKGROUND);
00350 }

00353 //The selection window method is initialized here.  This is where all the graphics for all
00354 //the categories are organized and loaded.  If you wish to move things around, then this is
00355 //where the initialization part is done.  I have also changed this from previously being loaded
00356 //every single time you go into a selection window which was redundant and CPU consuming.
00357 void InitJA2SelectionWindow( void )
00358 {
00359       INT32 iCount;
00360       INT32 iCount2;
00361       INT32 iCount3;
00362 
00363       UINT16                  usETRLEObjects;
00364       HVOBJECT          hVObject;
00365 
00366 
00367       pDispList = NULL;
00368 
00369       // Init the display spec lists for the types of selection windows
00370 
00371       // Trees & bushes (The tree button in the "terrain" toolbar)
00372       for ( iCount3 = 0, iCount = 0; iCount < (LASTOSTRUCT - FIRSTFULLSTRUCT + 1); iCount++ )
00373       {
00374             hVObject = gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[FIRSTFULLSTRUCT + iCount]].hTileSurface;
00375             usETRLEObjects = hVObject->usNumberOfObjects;
00376 
00377 
00378             for ( iCount2 = 0; iCount2 < usETRLEObjects; iCount2 += 3, iCount3++)
00379             {
00380                   OStructs[ iCount3 ].ubType = DISPLAY_GRAPHIC;
00381                   OStructs[ iCount3 ].hVObject = hVObject;
00382                   OStructs[ iCount3 ].usStart = (UINT16)iCount2;
00383                   OStructs[ iCount3 ].usEnd = (UINT16)iCount2;
00384                   OStructs[ iCount3 ].uiObjIndx = (FIRSTFULLSTRUCT + iCount);
00385             }
00386       }
00387 
00388       OStructs[ iCount3 ].ubType = DISPLAY_GRAPHIC;
00389       OStructs[ iCount3 ].hVObject = gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[SIXTHOSTRUCT]].hTileSurface;
00390       OStructs[ iCount3 ].usStart = DISPLAY_ALL_OBJECTS;
00391       OStructs[ iCount3 ].usEnd = 0;
00392       OStructs[ iCount3 ].uiObjIndx = SIXTHOSTRUCT;
00393 
00394       gusNumOStructs = (UINT16)iCount3 + 1;
00395 
00396       // Rocks & barrels! (the "1" button in the "terrain" toolbar)
00397       OStructs1[ 0 ].ubType = DISPLAY_GRAPHIC;
00398       OStructs1[ 0 ].hVObject = gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[FOURTHOSTRUCT]].hTileSurface;
00399       OStructs1[ 0 ].usStart = DISPLAY_ALL_OBJECTS;
00400       OStructs1[ 0 ].usEnd = 0;
00401       OStructs1[ 0 ].uiObjIndx = FOURTHOSTRUCT;
00402 
00403       for ( iCount = 0; iCount < (THIRDOSTRUCT - FIRSTOSTRUCT); iCount++ )
00404       {
00405             OStructs1[ iCount + 1 ].ubType = DISPLAY_GRAPHIC;
00406             OStructs1[ iCount + 1 ].hVObject = gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[FIRSTOSTRUCT + iCount]].hTileSurface;
00407             OStructs1[ iCount + 1 ].usStart = DISPLAY_ALL_OBJECTS;
00408             OStructs1[ iCount + 1 ].usEnd = 0;
00409             OStructs1[ iCount + 1 ].uiObjIndx = FIRSTOSTRUCT + iCount;
00410       }
00411 
00412       
00413       // Other junk! (the "2" button in the "terrain" toolbar)
00414       OStructs2[ 0 ].ubType = DISPLAY_GRAPHIC;
00415       OStructs2[ 0 ].hVObject = gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[THIRDOSTRUCT]].hTileSurface;
00416       OStructs2[ 0 ].usStart = DISPLAY_ALL_OBJECTS;
00417       OStructs2[ 0 ].usEnd = 0;
00418       OStructs2[ 0 ].uiObjIndx = THIRDOSTRUCT;
00419 
00420       OStructs2[ 1 ].ubType = DISPLAY_GRAPHIC;
00421       OStructs2[ 1 ].hVObject = gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[FIFTHOSTRUCT]].hTileSurface;
00422       OStructs2[ 1 ].usStart = DISPLAY_ALL_OBJECTS;
00423       OStructs2[ 1 ].usEnd = 0;
00424       OStructs2[ 1 ].uiObjIndx = FIFTHOSTRUCT;
00425 
00426       OStructs2[ 2 ].ubType = DISPLAY_GRAPHIC;
00427       OStructs2[ 2 ].hVObject = gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[SEVENTHOSTRUCT]].hTileSurface;
00428       OStructs2[ 2 ].usStart = DISPLAY_ALL_OBJECTS;
00429       OStructs2[ 2 ].usEnd = 0;
00430       OStructs2[ 2 ].uiObjIndx = SEVENTHOSTRUCT;
00431 
00432       OStructs2[ 3 ].ubType = DISPLAY_GRAPHIC;
00433       OStructs2[ 3 ].hVObject = gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[EIGHTOSTRUCT]].hTileSurface;
00434       OStructs2[ 3 ].usStart = DISPLAY_ALL_OBJECTS;
00435       OStructs2[ 3 ].usEnd = 0;
00436       OStructs2[ 3 ].uiObjIndx = EIGHTOSTRUCT;
00437

00764 
00765 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00766 //    ShutdownJA2SelectionWindow
00767 //
00768 //    Unloads selection window button images and makes sure any display list that may remain in memory
00769 //    is removed.
00770 //
00771 void ShutdownJA2SelectionWindow( void )
00772 {
00773       INT16 x;
00774 
00775       for (x = 0; x < 4; x++)
00776             UnloadGenericButtonIcon( (INT16)iButtonIcons[x] );
00777 
00778       if (pDispList != NULL)
00779       {
00780             pDispList = TrashList(pDispList);
00781       }
00782       gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
00783 }
00784 
00785 
00786 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00787 //    RemoveJA2SelectionWindow
00788 //
00789 //    Removes the selection window from the screen.
00790 //
00791 void RemoveJA2SelectionWindow( void )
00792 {
00793       RemoveButton(iSelectWin);
00794       RemoveButton(iCancelWin);
00795       RemoveButton(iScrollUp);
00796       RemoveButton(iScrollDown);
00797       RemoveButton(iOkWin);
00798 
00799       gfRenderSquareArea = FALSE;
00800 
00801       if (pDispList != NULL)
00802       {
00803             pDispList = TrashList(pDispList);
00804       }
00805       gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00806       
00807       gfOverheadMapDirty = TRUE;
00808       EnableEditorTaskbar( );
00809 }
00810  
00811 
00812 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00813 //    TrashList
00814 //
00815 //    Free the current display list for the selection window.
00816 //
00817 DisplayList *TrashList( DisplayList *pNode )
00818 {
00819       if (pNode == NULL)
00820             return(NULL);
00821 
00822       if (pNode->pNext != NULL)
00823             pNode->pNext = TrashList(pNode->pNext);
00824       
00825       if (pNode->pNext == NULL)
00826             MemFree(pNode);
00827       
00828       return(NULL);
00829 }
00830 
00831 
00832 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00833 //    RenderSelectionWindow
00834 //
00835 //    Displays the current selection window
00836 //
00837 void RenderSelectionWindow( void )
00838 {
00839       GUI_BUTTON *button;
00840       INT32 iSX,iSY,iEX,iEY;
00841       UINT16 usFillColor;
00842       static UINT8 usFillGreen = 0;
00843       static UINT8 usDir = 5;
00844 
00845 
00846       if (!fButtonsPresent)
00847             return;
00848 
00849       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER,
00850                                                                               0, 0, 600, 400,
00851                                                                               GenericButtonFillColors[0]);
00852       DrawSelections( );
00853       MarkButtonsDirty();
00854       RenderButtons( );
00855 
00856       if ( gfRenderSquareArea )
00857       {
00858             button = ButtonList[iSelectWin];
00859             if ( button == NULL )
00860                   return;
00861             
00862             if ( (abs( iStartClickX - button->Area.MouseXPos ) > 9) || 
00863                      (abs( iStartClickY - (button->Area.MouseYPos + iTopWinCutOff - (INT16)SelWinStartPoint.iY)) > 9) )
00864             {
00865 //                iSX = (INT32)iStartClickX;
00866 //                iEX = (INT32)button->Area.MouseXPos;
00867 //                iSY = (INT32)iStartClickY;
00868 //                iEY = (INT32)(button->Area.MouseYPos + iTopWinCutOff - (INT16)SelWinStartPoint.iY);
00869 
00870                   iSX = iStartClickX;
00871                   iSY = iStartClickY - iTopWinCutOff + SelWinStartPoint.iY;
00872                   iEX = gusMouseXPos;
00873                   iEY = gusMouseYPos;
00874 
00875 
00876                   if (iEX < iSX)
00877                   {
00878                         iEX ^= iSX;
00879                         iSX ^= iEX;
00880                         iEX ^= iSX;
00881                   }
00882 
00883                   if (iEY < iSY)
00884                   {
00885                         iEY ^= iSY;
00886                         iSY ^= iEY;
00887                         iEY ^= iSY;
00888                   }
00889 
00890                   iEX = min( iEX, 600 );
00891                   iSY = max( SelWinStartPoint.iY, iSY );
00892                   iEY = min( 359, iEY );
00893                   iEY = max( SelWinStartPoint.iY, iEY );
00894 
00895                   usFillColor = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(255, usFillGreen, 0));
00896                   usFillGreen += usDir;
00897                   if( usFillGreen > 250 )
00898                         usDir = 251;
00899                   else if( usFillGreen < 5 )
00900                         usDir = 5;
00901 
00902                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, iSX, iSY, iEX, iSY+1, usFillColor );
00903                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, iSX, iEY, iEX, iEY+1, usFillColor );
00904                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, iSX, iSY, iSX+1, iEY, usFillColor );
00905                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(FRAME_BUFFER, iEX, iSY, iEX+1, iEY, usFillColor );
00906             }
00907       }
00908 }
00909 
00910 
00911 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00912 //    SelWinClkCallback
00913 //
00914 //    Button callback function for the main selection window. Checks if user clicked on an image,
00915 //    if so selects or de-selects that object. Also handles the multi-object selection (left-click
00916 //    and drag to get the selection rectangle)
00917 //
00918 void SelWinClkCallback( GUI_BUTTON *button, INT32 reason )
00919 {
00920       DisplayList *pNode;
00921       BOOLEAN fDone;
00922       INT16 iClickX,iClickY, iYInc, iXInc;
00923 
00924 
00925       if (!(button->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00926             return;
00927             
00928       iClickX = button->Area.MouseXPos;
00929       iClickY = button->Area.MouseYPos + iTopWinCutOff - (INT16)SelWinStartPoint.iY;
00930 
00931       if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
00932       {
00933             button->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00934             iStartClickX = iClickX;
00935             iStartClickY = iClickY;
00936             gfRenderSquareArea = TRUE;
00937       }
00938       else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
00939       {
00940             button->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00941 
00942             if ( gfRenderSquareArea )
00943             {
00944                   gfRenderSquareArea = FALSE;
00945                   return;
00946             }
00947 
00948             // Code to figure out what image user wants goes here
00949             pNode = pDispList;
00950 
00951             fDone = FALSE;
00952             while( (pNode != NULL) && !fDone )
00953             {
00954                   if ( (iClickX >= pNode->iX) && (iClickX < (pNode->iX + pNode->iWidth)) &&
00955                               (iClickY >= pNode->iY) && (iClickY < (pNode->iY + pNode->iHeight)) )
00956                   {
00957                         fDone = TRUE;
00958                         if ( RemoveFromSelectionList(pNode) )
00959                               pNode->fChosen = FALSE;
00960                   }
00961                   else
00962                         pNode = pNode->pNext;
00963             }
00964       }
00965       else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
00966       {
00967             button->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00968       }
00969       else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00970       {
00971             button->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00972             
00973             if( !gfRenderSquareArea )
00974                   return;
00975 
00976             iEndClickX = iClickX;
00977             iEndClickY = iClickY;
00978 
00979             gfRenderSquareArea = FALSE;
00980 
00981             if( iEndClickX < iStartClickX )
00982             {
00983                   iStartClickX ^= iEndClickX;
00984                   iEndClickX ^= iStartClickX;
00985                   iStartClickX ^= iEndClickX;
00986             }
00987 
00988             if( iEndClickY < iStartClickY )
00989             {
00990                   iStartClickY ^= iEndClickY;
00991                   iEndClickY ^= iStartClickY;
00992                   iStartClickY ^= iEndClickY;
00993             }
00994 
00995             iXInc = iYInc = 1;
00996             for( iClickY = iStartClickY; iClickY <= iEndClickY; iClickY += iYInc )
00997             {
00998                   iYInc = 1;
00999                   for( iClickX = iStartClickX; iClickX <= iEndClickX; iClickX += iXInc )
01000                   {
01001                         iXInc = 1;
01002                         // Code to figure out what image user wants goes here
01003                         pNode = pDispList;
01004 
01005                         fDone = FALSE;
01006                         while( (pNode != NULL) && !fDone )
01007                         {
01008                               if ( (iClickX >= pNode->iX) && (iClickX < (pNode->iX + pNode->iWidth)) &&
01009                                           (iClickY >= pNode->iY) && (iClickY < (pNode->iY + pNode->iHeight)) )
01010                               {
01011                                     fDone = TRUE;
01012                                     AddToSelectionList(pNode);
01013                                     pNode->fChosen = TRUE;
01014                                     iXInc = (pNode->iX + pNode->iWidth) - iClickX;
01015                                     if ( iYInc < ((pNode->iY + pNode->iHeight) - iClickY) )
01016                                           iYInc = (pNode->iY + pNode->iHeight) - iClickY;
01017                               }
01018                               else
01019                                     pNode = pNode->pNext;
01020                         }
01021                   }
01022             }
01023       }
01024 }
01025 
01026 //When a selection window is up, the file information of the picture will display
01027 //at the top of the screen.
01028 void DisplaySelectionWindowGraphicalInformation()
01029 {
01030       DisplayList *pNode;
01031       BOOLEAN fDone;
01032       //UINT16 usObjIndex, usIndex;
01033       UINT16 y;
01034       //Determine if there is a valid picture at cursor position.
01035       //iRelX = gusMouseXPos;
01036       //iRelY = gusMouseYPos + iTopWinCutOff - (INT16)SelWinStartPoint.iY;
01037 
01038       y = gusMouseYPos + iTopWinCutOff - (UINT16)SelWinStartPoint.iY;
01039       pNode = pDispList;
01040       fDone = FALSE;
01041       while( (pNode != NULL) && !fDone )
01042       {
01043             if ( (gusMouseXPos >= pNode->iX) && (gusMouseXPos < (pNode->iX + pNode->iWidth)) &&
01044                         (y >= pNode->iY) && (y < (pNode->iY + pNode->iHeight)) )
01045             {
01046                   fDone = TRUE;
01047                   //pNode->fChosen = TRUE;
01048                   //iXInc = (pNode->iX + pNode->iWidth) - iClickX;
01049                   //if ( iYInc < ((pNode->iY + pNode->iHeight) - iClickY) )
01050                   //    iYInc = (pNode->iY + pNode->iHeight) - iClickY;
01051             }
01052             else
01053                   pNode = pNode->pNext;
01054       }
01055       SetFont( FONT12POINT1 );
01056       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
01057       if( pNode ) 
01058       {
01059             //usObjIndex = (UINT16)pNode->uiObjIndx;
01060             //usIndex = pNode->uiIndex;
01061             if( !gTilesets[ giCurrentTilesetID].TileSurfaceFilenames[ pNode->uiObjIndx ][0] )
01062             {
01063                   mprintf( 2, 2, L"%S[%d] is from default tileset %s (%S)",
01064                         gTilesets[0].TileSurfaceFilenames[ pNode->uiObjIndx ],
01065                         pNode->uiIndex, gTilesets[0].zName,
01066                         gTileSurfaceName[ pNode->uiObjIndx ] );
01067             }
01068             else
01069             {
01070                   mprintf( 2, 2, L"File:  %S, subindex:  %d (%S)", 
01071                         gTilesets[ giCurrentTilesetID ].TileSurfaceFilenames[ pNode->uiObjIndx ],
01072                         pNode->uiIndex, gTileSurfaceName[ pNode->uiObjIndx ] );
01073             }
01074       }
01075       mprintf( 350, 2, L"Current Tileset:  %s", gTilesets[ giCurrentTilesetID ].zName );
01076 }     
01077 
01078 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01079 //    AddToSelectionList
01080 //
01081 //    Add an object in the display list to the selection list. If the object already exists in the
01082 //    selection list, then it's count is incremented.
01083 //
01084 void AddToSelectionList( DisplayList *pNode )
01085 {
01086       INT32 iIndex, iUseIndex;
01087       BOOLEAN fDone;
01088 
01089       fDone = FALSE;
01090       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < (*pNumSelList) && !fDone; iIndex++ )
01091       {
01092             if ( pNode->uiObjIndx == pSelList[ iIndex ].uiObject &&
01093                          pNode->uiIndex == pSelList[ iIndex ].usIndex )
01094             {
01095                   fDone = TRUE;
01096                   iUseIndex = iIndex;
01097             }
01098       }     
01099       
01100       if ( fDone )
01101       {
01102             // Was already in the list, so bump up the count
01103             pSelList[ iUseIndex ].sCount++;
01104       }
01105       else
01106       {
01107             // Wasn't in the list, so add to end (if space available)
01108             if ( (*pNumSelList) < MAX_SELECTIONS )
01109             {
01110                   pSelList[ (*pNumSelList) ].uiObject = pNode->uiObjIndx;
01111                   pSelList[ (*pNumSelList) ].usIndex = pNode->uiIndex;
01112                   pSelList[ (*pNumSelList) ].sCount = 1;
01113 
01114                   (*pNumSelList)++;
01115             }
01116       }
01117 }
01118 
01119 
01120 
01121 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01122 //    ClearSelectionList
01123 //
01124 //    Removes everything from the current selection list
01125 //
01126 BOOLEAN ClearSelectionList( void )
01127 {
01128       INT32 iIndex;
01129       DisplayList *pNode;
01130 
01131 
01132       if (pNumSelList == NULL )
01133             return( FALSE );
01134 
01135       pNode = pDispList;
01136       while ( pNode != NULL )
01137       {
01138             pNode->fChosen = FALSE;
01139             pNode = pNode->pNext;
01140       }
01141 
01142       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < (*pNumSelList); iIndex++ )
01143             pSelList[ iIndex ].sCount = 0;
01144 
01145       (*pNumSelList) = 0;
01146       return( TRUE );
01147 }
01148 
01149 
01150 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01151 //    RemoveFromSelectionList
01152 //
01153 //    Removes the object given n a display list from the selection list. If the objects count is
01154 //    greater than one, then the count is decremented and the object remains in the list.
01155 //
01156 BOOLEAN RemoveFromSelectionList( DisplayList *pNode )
01157 {
01158       INT32 iIndex, iUseIndex;
01159       BOOLEAN fDone, fRemoved;
01160 
01161       // Abort if no entries in list (pretend we removed a node)
01162       if ( (*pNumSelList) <= 0 )
01163             return( TRUE );
01164 
01165       fRemoved = FALSE;
01166       fDone = FALSE;
01167       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < (*pNumSelList) && !fDone; iIndex++ )
01168       {
01169             if ( pNode->uiObjIndx == pSelList[ iIndex ].uiObject &&
01170                          pNode->uiIndex == pSelList[ iIndex ].usIndex )
01171             {
01172                   fDone = TRUE;
01173                   iUseIndex = iIndex;
01174             }
01175       }     
01176       
01177       if ( fDone )
01178       {
01179             // Was already in the list, so bump up the count
01180             pSelList[ iUseIndex ].sCount--;
01181 
01182             if ( pSelList[ iUseIndex ].sCount <= 0 )
01183             {
01184                   // Squash the list to remove old entry
01185                   for ( iIndex = iUseIndex; iIndex < ((*pNumSelList) - 1); iIndex++ )
01186                         pSelList[ iIndex ] = pSelList[ iIndex + 1 ];
01187                   
01188                   (*pNumSelList)--;
01189                   fRemoved = TRUE;
01190             }
01191       }
01192 
01193       return ( fRemoved );
01194 }
01195 
01196 
01197 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01198 //    GetRandomSelection
01199 //
01200 //    Randomly selects an item in the selection list. The object counts are taken into account so
01201 //    that objects with higher counts will be chosen more often.
01202 //
01203 INT32 GetRandomSelection( void )
01204 {
01205       INT32 iRandNum, iTotalCounts;
01206       INT32 iIndex, iSelectedIndex, iNextCount;
01207 
01208       if ( fDontUseRandom )
01209       {
01210             fDontUseRandom = FALSE;
01211             return( iCurBank );
01212       }
01213       
01214       iTotalCounts = 0;
01215       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < (*pNumSelList); iIndex++ )
01216             iTotalCounts += (INT32)pSelList[ iIndex ].sCount;
01217 
01218       iRandNum = Random( iTotalCounts );
01219 
01220       iSelectedIndex = -1;
01221       iNextCount = 0;
01222       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < (*pNumSelList) && iSelectedIndex == -1; iIndex++ )
01223       {
01224             iNextCount += (INT32)pSelList[ iIndex ].sCount;
01225             if ( iRandNum < iNextCount )
01226                   iSelectedIndex = iIndex;
01227       }
01228 
01229       return ( iSelectedIndex );
01230 }
01231

01233 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01234 //    IsInSelectionList
01235 //
01236 //    Verifies if a particular display list object exists in the current selection list.
01237 //
01238 BOOLEAN IsInSelectionList( DisplayList *pNode )
01239 {
01240       INT32 iIndex;
01241       BOOLEAN fFound;
01242 
01243       fFound = FALSE;
01244       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < (*pNumSelList) && !fFound; iIndex++ )
01245       {
01246             if ( pNode->uiObjIndx == pSelList[ iIndex ].uiObject &&
01247                          pNode->uiIndex == pSelList[ iIndex ].usIndex )
01248             {
01249                   fFound = TRUE;
01250             }
01251       }     
01252       
01253       return ( fFound );
01254 }
01255

01257 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01258 //    FindInSelectionList
01259 //
01260 //    Finds an occurance of a particular display list object in the current selection list.
01261 //    if found, returns the selection list's index where it can be found. otherwise it
01262 //    returns -1
01263 //
01264 INT32 FindInSelectionList( DisplayList *pNode )
01265 {
01266       INT32 iIndex,iUseIndex;
01267       BOOLEAN fFound;
01268 
01269       fFound = FALSE;
01270       iUseIndex = -1;
01271       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < (*pNumSelList) && !fFound; iIndex++ )
01272       {
01273             if ( pNode->uiObjIndx == pSelList[ iIndex ].uiObject &&
01274                          pNode->uiIndex == pSelList[ iIndex ].usIndex )
01275             {
01276                   fFound = TRUE;
01277                   iUseIndex = iIndex;
01278             }
01279       }     
01280       
01281       return ( iUseIndex );
01282 }

01285 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01286 //    SaveSelectionList
01287 //
01288 //    Copies the current selection list to a save buffer. Used in case we want to cancel a 
01289 //    selection window.
01290 //
01291 void SaveSelectionList( void )
01292 {
01293       INT32 iIndex;
01294 
01295       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < MAX_SELECTIONS; iIndex++ )
01296             OldSelList[ iIndex ] = pSelList[ iIndex ];
01297 
01298       iOldNumSelList = (*pNumSelList);
01299 }
01300 
01301 
01302 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01303 //    RestoreSelectionList
01304 //
01305 //    Copies the selection list in the save buffer back to the current selection list.
01306 //
01307 void RestoreSelectionList( void )
01308 {
01309       INT32 iIndex;
01310 
01311       for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < MAX_SELECTIONS; iIndex++ )
01312             pSelList[ iIndex ] = OldSelList[ iIndex ];
01313 
01314       (*pNumSelList) = iOldNumSelList;
01315 }

01373       }

01376 
01377 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01378 //    ScrollSelWinUp
01379 //
01380 //    Performs the calculations required to actually scroll a selection window up by one line.
01381 //
01382 void ScrollSelWinUp(void)
01383 {
01384       DisplayList *pNode;
01385       INT16 iCutOff,iBotCutOff;
01386       BOOLEAN fDone;
01387 
01388       // Code to scroll window up!
01389       pNode = pDispList;
01390       iCutOff = iTopWinCutOff;
01391 
01392       fDone = FALSE;
01393       while( (pNode != NULL) && !fDone )
01394       {
01395             if (pNode->iY >= iTopWinCutOff)
01396             {
01397                   iCutOff = pNode->iY;
01398                   pNode = pNode->pNext;
01399             }
01400             else
01401             {
01402                   iCutOff = pNode->iY;
01403                   fDone = TRUE;
01404             }
01405       }
01406 
01407       iBotCutOff = iBotWinCutOff - iTopWinCutOff + iCutOff;
01408       iTopWinCutOff = iCutOff;
01409 }
01410 
01411 
01412 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01413 //    ScrollSelWinDown
01414 //
01415 //    Performs the actual calculations for scrolling a selection window down.
01416 //
01417 void ScrollSelWinDown(void)
01418 {
01419       DisplayList *pNode;
01420       INT16 iCutOff,iBotCutOff;
01421       BOOLEAN fDone;
01422 
01423       pNode = pDispList;
01424       iCutOff = iTopWinCutOff;
01425 
01426       fDone = FALSE;
01427       while( (pNode != NULL) && !fDone )
01428       {
01429             if (pNode->iY > iTopWinCutOff)
01430             {
01431                   iCutOff = pNode->iY;
01432                   pNode = pNode->pNext;
01433             }
01434             else
01435                   fDone = TRUE;
01436       }
01437 
01438       iBotCutOff = iBotWinCutOff - iTopWinCutOff + iCutOff;
01439       iTopWinCutOff = iCutOff;
01440 }
01441

01445 //
01446 //    Button callback function to scroll the selection window down.
01447 //
01448 void DwnClkCallback( GUI_BUTTON *button, INT32 reason )

01456             button->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01457             ScrollSelWinDown();

01463 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01464 //    DrawSelections
01465 //
01466 //    Displays the objects in the display list to the selection window.
01467 //
01468 void DrawSelections( void )
01469 {
01470       SGPRect                             ClipRect, NewRect;
01471 
01472       NewRect.iLeft = SelWinStartPoint.iX;
01473       NewRect.iTop = SelWinStartPoint.iY;
01474       NewRect.iRight = SelWinEndPoint.iX;
01475       NewRect.iBottom = SelWinEndPoint.iY;
01476 
01477       GetClippingRect(&ClipRect);
01478       SetClippingRect(&NewRect);
01479       
01480 //    SetFont( gpSmallFont );
01481       SetFont( gpLargeFontType1 );
01482       SetObjectShade( gvoLargeFontType1, 0 );
01483 //    SetObjectShade( gvoLargeFont, 0 );
01484 
01485       DisplayWindowFunc( pDispList, iTopWinCutOff, iBotWinCutOff, &SelWinStartPoint, CLEAR_BACKGROUND );
01486       
01487       SetObjectShade( gvoLargeFontType1, 4 );
01488 
01489       SetClippingRect(&ClipRect);
01490 }

01492 
01493 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01494 //    BuildDisplayWindow
01495 //
01496 //    Creates a display list from a display specification list. It also sets variables up for
01497 //    properly scrolling the window etc.
01498 //
01499 BOOLEAN BuildDisplayWindow( DisplaySpec *pDisplaySpecs, UINT16 usNumSpecs, DisplayList **pDisplayList,
01500                                                                                     SGPPoint * pUpperLeft, SGPPoint * pBottomRight, 
01501                                                                                     SGPPoint * pSpacing, UINT16 fFlags )
01502 {
01503       INT32                               iCurrX = pUpperLeft->iX;
01504       INT32                               iCurrY = pUpperLeft->iY;
01505       UINT16                              usGreatestHeightInRow = 0;
01506       UINT16                              usSpecLoop;
01507       UINT16                              usETRLELoop;
01508       UINT16                              usETRLEStart;
01509       UINT16                              usETRLEEnd;
01510       DisplaySpec *           pDisplaySpec;
01511       ETRLEObject *           pETRLEObject;
01512       DisplayList             *pCurNode;
01513 
01514       SaveSelectionList();
01515 
01516       for (usSpecLoop = 0; usSpecLoop < usNumSpecs; usSpecLoop++)
01517       {
01518             pDisplaySpec = &(pDisplaySpecs[usSpecLoop]);
01519             if (pDisplaySpec->ubType == DISPLAY_GRAPHIC)
01520             {
01521                   if( !pDisplaySpec->hVObject )
01522                         return FALSE;
01523                   usETRLEStart = pDisplaySpec->usStart;
01524                   usETRLEEnd = pDisplaySpec->usEnd;
01525 
01526                   if ( usETRLEStart == DISPLAY_ALL_OBJECTS )
01527                   {
01528                         usETRLEStart = 0;
01529                         usETRLEEnd = pDisplaySpec->hVObject->usNumberOfObjects - 1;
01530                   }
01531 
01532                   if( usETRLEStart > usETRLEEnd )
01533                         return FALSE;
01534                   if( usETRLEEnd >= pDisplaySpec->hVObject->usNumberOfObjects )
01535                         return FALSE;
01536 
01537                   for( usETRLELoop = usETRLEStart; usETRLELoop <= usETRLEEnd; usETRLELoop++)
01538                   {
01539                         pETRLEObject = &(pDisplaySpec->hVObject->pETRLEObject[usETRLELoop]);
01540 
01541                         if ((iCurrX + pETRLEObject->usWidth > pBottomRight->iX) || (fFlags & ONE_COLUMN))
01542                         {
01543                               if (fFlags & ONE_ROW)
01544                               {
01545                                     break;
01546                               }
01547                               iCurrX = pUpperLeft->iX;
01548                               iCurrY += usGreatestHeightInRow + pSpacing->iY;
01549                               usGreatestHeightInRow = 0;
01550                         }
01551                         
01552                         if ((pCurNode = (DisplayList *)MemAlloc(sizeof(DisplayList))) != FALSE)
01553                         {
01554                               pCurNode->hObj = pDisplaySpec->hVObject;
01555                               pCurNode->uiIndex = usETRLELoop;
01556                               pCurNode->iX = (INT16)iCurrX;
01557                               pCurNode->iY = (INT16)iCurrY;
01558                               pCurNode->iWidth = pETRLEObject->usWidth;
01559                               pCurNode->iHeight = pETRLEObject->usHeight;
01560                               pCurNode->pNext = *pDisplayList;
01561                               pCurNode->uiObjIndx = pDisplaySpec->uiObjIndx;
01562 
01563                               if ( IsInSelectionList( pCurNode ) )
01564                                     pCurNode->fChosen = TRUE;
01565                               else
01566                                     pCurNode->fChosen = FALSE;
01567 
01568                               *pDisplayList = pCurNode;
01569                         }
01570                         else
01571                               return(FALSE);
01572 
01573                         if (pETRLEObject->usHeight > usGreatestHeightInRow)
01574                         {
01575                               usGreatestHeightInRow = pETRLEObject->usHeight;
01576                         }
01577 
01578                         iCurrX += pETRLEObject->usWidth + pSpacing->iX;
01579                   }     
01580             }
01581       }
01582 
01583       return( TRUE );
01584 }
01585 
01586 
01587 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01588 //    DisplayWindowFunc
01589 //
01590 //    Blits the actual object images in the display list on the selection window. The objects that
01591 //    have been selected (in the selection list) are highlighted and the count placed in the upper
01592 //    left corner of the image.
01593 //
01594 BOOLEAN DisplayWindowFunc( DisplayList *pNode, INT16 iTopCutOff, INT16 iBottomCutOff, SGPPoint *pUpperLeft, UINT16 fFlags)
01595 {
01596       INT16                               iCurrY;
01597       INT16                               sTempOffsetX;
01598       INT16                               sTempOffsetY;
01599       BOOLEAN                             fReturnVal;
01600       ETRLEObject *           pETRLEObject;
01601       UINT16                              usFillColor;
01602       INT16                               sCount;
01603       
01604       if ( pNode == NULL )
01605             return(TRUE);
01606 
01607       if ( pNode->iY < iTopCutOff )
01608             return(TRUE);
01609 
01610       fReturnVal = FALSE;
01611       if (DisplayWindowFunc(pNode->pNext, iTopCutOff, iBottomCutOff, pUpperLeft, fFlags))
01612       {
01613             iCurrY = pUpperLeft->iY + pNode->iY - iTopCutOff;
01614 
01615             if ( iCurrY > iBottomCutOff )
01616                   return(TRUE);
01617 
01618             pETRLEObject = &(pNode->hObj->pETRLEObject[pNode->uiIndex]);
01619 
01620             // We have to store the offset data in temp variables before zeroing them and blitting
01621             sTempOffsetX = pETRLEObject->sOffsetX;
01622             sTempOffsetY = pETRLEObject->sOffsetY;
01623 
01624             // Set the offsets used for blitting to 0
01625             pETRLEObject->sOffsetX = 0;
01626             pETRLEObject->sOffsetY = 0;
01627 
01628 
01629             if (fFlags & CLEAR_BACKGROUND)
01630             {
01631                   usFillColor = SelWinFillColor;
01632                   if (pNode->fChosen)
01633                         usFillColor = SelWinHilightFillColor;
01634 
01635                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pNode->iX, iCurrY,
01636                                                                         pNode->iX + pNode->iWidth, 
01637                                                                         iCurrY + pNode->iHeight, usFillColor);
01638             }
01639 
01640             sCount = 0;
01641             if (pNode->fChosen)
01642                   sCount = pSelList[ FindInSelectionList( pNode ) ].sCount;
01643 
01644             SetObjectShade( pNode->hObj, DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL );
01645             fReturnVal = BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, pNode->hObj, pNode->uiIndex, 
01646                                                                                     (UINT16)pNode->iX, (UINT16)iCurrY,
01647                                                                                     VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
01648 
01649             if ( sCount != 0)
01650             {
01651                   gprintf( pNode->iX, iCurrY, L"%d", sCount );
01652             }
01653 
01654             pETRLEObject->sOffsetX = sTempOffsetX;
01655             pETRLEObject->sOffsetY = sTempOffsetY;
01656       }
01657 
01658       return(fReturnVal);
01659 }
01660

01662 
01663 
01664 
01665 #endif
